devdoc.author: fedealconada + jparklev

addAdapter(address).details: when permissionless is disabled, only the Periphery can onboard adaptersafter permissionless is enabled, anyone can onboard adapters

params._lscales: Values to set on lscales mapping
params._usrs: Values to set on lscales mapping
params.mscale: Value to set as the Series' Scale value at maturity

combine(address,uint256,uint256).details: Explicitly burns YTs before maturity, and implicitly does it at/after maturity through `_collect()`

params.uBal: Balance of PT and YT to burn

initSeries(address,uint256,address).details: Deploys two ERC20 contracts, one for PTs and the other one for YTsTransfers some fixed amount of stake asset to this contract

params.adapter: Adapter to associate with the Series
params.maturity: Maturity date for the new Series, in units of unix time
params.sponsor: Sponsor of the Series that puts up a token stake and receives the issuance fees

issue(address,uint256,uint256).details: The balance of PTs and YTs minted will be the same value in units of underlying (less fees)

params.maturity: Maturity date for the Series [unix time]

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

redeem(address,uint256,uint256).details: The balance of redeemable Target is a function of the change in Scale

params.uBal: Amount of PT to burn, which should be equivalent to the amount of Underlying owed to the caller

params.isOn: Flag setting this adapter to enabled or disabled

params.cap: The max target that can be deposited on the Adapter

settleSeries(address,uint256).details: The Series' sponsor has a grace period where only they can settle the SeriesAfter that, the reward becomes MEV

params.adapter: Adapter to associate with the Series
params.maturity: Maturity date for the new Series

devdoc.title: Sense Divider: Divide Assets in Two

SETTLEMENT_WINDOW().notice: Buffer after the sponsor window in which anyone can settle the Series

SPONSOR_WINDOW().notice: Buffer before and after the actual maturity in which only the sponsor can settle the Series

backfillScale(address,uint256,uint256,ad.notice: Backfill a Series' Scale value at maturity if keepers failed to settle it

combine(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Reconstitute Target by burning PT and YT

issue(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Mint Principal & Yield Tokens of a specific Series

redeem(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Burn PT of a Series once it's been settled

settleSeries(address,uint256).notice: Settles a Series and transfers the settlement reward to the caller

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to issue, combine, and redeem Sense ERC20 Principal and Yield Tokens
